ch0064_01_rival/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You seem to be
doing well, as always.
ch0064_01_rival/0101_0701_02_10: But...today’s the day I’m gonna beat you!
ch0064_01_rival/7101_0701_01_10:
When the sun sets, day turns into night, yet the sun
still rises again...
ch0064_01_rival/7101_0701_02_10:
People and Pokémon are all heading towards the
future. As we do, we experience joy...and we
also worry...
ch0064_01_rival/7101_0701_03_10: That’s just how the world is, right?
ch0064_01_rival/7102_0701_01_10:
I’ve been helping Looker with his duties as an
International Police officer...
ch0064_01_rival/7102_0701_02_10:
But I have to say, it’s a tough job. Now I know
why people say he’s an elite.
ch0064_01_rival/7103_0701_01_10:
I might not be quite as good as N at calculations,
but I’m pretty good.
ch0064_01_rival/7103_0701_02_10:
Tina’s not so great at math, so I often end up
tutoring her.
ch0064_01_rival/7104_0701_01_10: Hey! Did you see this month’s Poké Journal?
ch0064_01_rival/7104_0701_02_10:
I read that a new species of Pokémon might’ve
been discovered!
ch0064_01_rival/7104_0701_03_10:
I wonder what type it is. Maybe it’ll revolutionize
Pokémon battles!
ch0064_01_rival/7105_0701_01_10:
No matter how hard I try, I might not be able to
catch up to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0064_01_rival/7105_0701_03_10:
Working hard with my Pokémon to follow
my dreams...
ch0064_01_rival/7105_0701_04_10: I’ve realized that’s pretty fun, too!
ch0064_01_rival/7105_0701_05_10: I haven’t given up on winning, though.
ch0064_01_rival/1701_0701_01_10:
Take this, if you like. Consider it a thank-you for
everything you do for me.
ch0064_01_rival/1701_0702_01_10: Come train with me again sometime, OK?
ch0064_01_rival/2501_0701_01_10:
I wonder if right now, in a town somewhere,
some new Trainers are just starting out on their
own journey with their first Pokémon.
ch0064_01_rival/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ll be sure to make myself useful when I’m
cooperating with the International Police so those
Trainers don’t stray from the right path.
ch0064_01_rival/2501_0701_03_10:
I don’t want them to end up like me or the kind of
adults that join villainous organizations.
ch0064_01_rival/2501_0702_01_10:
What was it like for you when you first got your
Pokémon and set out on your journey,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0064_01_rival/2501_0702_02_10: If you’re OK telling me, I’d like to hear your story!
ch0064_01_rival/2511_0701_01_10:
After talking to the grunts of villainous 
organizations, I’ve noticed something.
ch0064_01_rival/2511_0701_02_10:
Some of them faced some kind of crushing
disappointment on their path as a Trainer.
ch0064_01_rival/2511_0701_03_10:
Maybe if something had gone differently, they
wouldn’t have turned to evil.
ch0064_01_rival/2511_0702_01_10: I was able to bounce back thanks to you all.
ch0064_01_rival/2511_0702_02_10: But I also think that I was lucky.
ch0064_01_rival/2511_0702_03_10:
Next time, I’ll be sure to be the one reaching out
to others.
ch0064_01_rival/2511_0702_04_10: I think that’s a role only I can play.
ch0064_01_rival/3001_0701_01_10:
There’s a lot I want to do each day, so I always
wake up early. I don’t want to waste my time.
ch0064_01_rival/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m taking a little break. Being alert all the time
can get tiring.
ch0064_01_rival/3005_0701_01_10:
I spent some time watching the sunset with my
partner Pokémon. It might not seem like much,
but it was really special to me.
